title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Local Markets
purpose: To provide a conduit for the markets industry to advance the case for markets and to raise issues about their welfare. It provides a forum for discussions about policy, strategy and operational issues recognising the role of markets and market trading in retail, tourism, employment, hospitality, and leisure sectors.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 020 7219 7706.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: David Preston, National Association of Market Authorities. Tel: 07989 943 444
contact_details.secretariat: National Association of Market Authorities acts as the group's secretariat. https://nabma.com/
